WRITING.TEXT: 2mg ativan won't knock you off your ass, but it will feel chill af especially when smoking bud as well. Be prepared for no anxiety. Idk if I would describe it as intense or euphoric tho. Maybe 10mg. lol

Paige. I have suffered from an anxiety disorder for my whole life essentially and I would like to know how she's doing, if the ALDC still remains as a traumatic memory, or if she sees it for the positive experiences and tries to dissociate from the negative. I know that my anx developed from social rejection from my siblings and peers- wonder how it must have felt coming from an adult, an AUTHORITY figure. Honestly, Paige should write a book someday. I bet she will.
You need to take care of your hair... It's fine to have it long, but it's greasy as fuck. That will contribute to acne. Also no, you're not fat.
This is me now, btw. Still not much of an improvement but at least I don't wear leg warmers on my arms anymore. https://www.instagram.com/p/_6eoN7A0J5/?taken-by=pressthejess

WRITING.TITLE: from one phase to the next

WRITING.TEXT: She made fun of my favourite musician after I asked her to stop. Sounds petty but she's very judgemental and that was the last straw, I suppose. Said musician was getting me through a really tough time, I really look up to her, and ex-friend knew that. She was just looking to put me down and be a snotty little bitch.
